list: Sturdy steel frame with a powder-coated black finish is both durable and attractive
1-year limited parts warranty gives you peace of mind
Black polyester fabric stands up to everyday use
Made for both indoor and outdoor use, so you can use this chair in any setting

reviews.title: "Good chair for the price"
reviews.text: It was a last minute purchase out of necessity, if I had more time and money I would have gotten a more comfortable chair.... The arms are a little low for my liking, and the seat rests on the metal which makes it slightly uncomfortable.... But it was way better than having to stand at a craft show for 2 days!!!
reviews.author: Dawn

reviews.title: "Great chair!"
reviews.text: It's light weight, unfolds and folds easily, comes with a bag that has a shoulder strap for carrying the chair and during the summer, the fabric is much more comfortable than a vinyl or plastic chair. It's a good price as well.
reviews.author: Jann

reviews.title: "Bought two of course."
reviews.text: Why is the event always on the other side of the only available parking? Lightweight
reviews.author: Roadie

reviews.title: "Great portable chair"
reviews.text: Love the chair. Very lightweight and easy to carry around yet comfortable to set in and does nor feel unstable in any way. Would recommend to anyone that wants a lightweight traveling chair.
reviews.author: Nankee

reviews.title: "Good value for price."
reviews.text: Bought 2 of these chairs to use for a 3-day outdoor event. The grommet on one of the chairs tore within 1st hour of event. Wasn't expecting much, considering the price. Got us through the weekend.
reviews.author: Nettie

reviews.title: "He loves it!"
reviews.text: I purchased this for my dad & he loves it! The easy shoulder strap that comes with it makes it easy for him to take on his walk to the beach. Well worth the money.
reviews.author: Sflakes01

reviews.title: "One Good, One Not"
reviews.text: We bought 2 of these chairs. Last minute online order. One chair was sewn very crooked. But we did not pay much for them.
reviews.author: Brian

reviews.title: "Does what it's meant to do"
reviews.text: These are average chairs but they are light to carry. I can't say anything bad about them.
reviews.author: bill

reviews.title: "Cheaply made"
reviews.text: Fabric is closer to a shower curtain than a comfortable camp chair.  Although light weight...not worth it. We returned them and will purchase something nicer.
reviews.author: PalmerMom

reviews.title: "Cheaply made.. disappointed"
reviews.text: I thought Lowe's may have better qualify folding / bag chairs, but this was the only one they offered in the Store. If I had more time, I would have went to more stores, but we were on our way to an event and thought we could get the other items we needed and the chair at Lowe's. It serves a purpose, but nothing special.
reviews.author: anne

reviews.title: "Steel camping chair"
reviews.text: Don't know yet about endurance, tine will tell. Like the steel frame and the liteness of it. Fabric seems fine.
reviews.author: Susie

reviews.title: "Seat size too narrow"
reviews.text: The seat is very small. The design puts the chair legs under a person's upper leg. It was light weight but 5 minutes was as long as it was comfortable to sit in.
reviews.author: NONE

reviews.title: "sturdy, light weight, compact, portable fold chair"
reviews.text: nice quality chair with arms, with features above, makes these chars a good value @ $9.99!! Most patio chairs run $20-30 each, and these are much more portable.
reviews.author: Medicineman

reviews.title: "Compact size chair"
reviews.text: Nice and comfortable doesn't take any space in trunk.
reviews.author: Rental

reviews.title: "Light Weight and Rugget"
reviews.text: These chairs are a joy to carry to our Dunedin dog park.  They are inexpensive, rugged, and light weight.  I  bring four to the park, one for my wife and one for me, and two for friends.  I can carry all four in to the park with no difficulty.  They are a bargain for the money, and I would recommend them to anyone needing a lightweight, portable chair.
reviews.author: Riverwisdom

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: DJ

reviews.title: "Very useful"
reviews.text: We picked this chair up at Lowe's to replace some old ones. We love it, comfortable and light weight and fits in the back of our cars. Use them for everything! Use them at the house when company comes to sit in the backyard or the garage.
reviews.author: Rick

reviews.title: "Take it everywhere!"
reviews.text: I love my chair I leave it in the back of my truck and take it everywhere for the park to running events to my house and sit in the yard with neighbors and chat. There are comfortable and lightweight as well as easy to clean. Love them
reviews.author: Suzie

reviews.title: "Comfortable chairs and great value"
reviews.text: I bought two of these chairs to sit in while we waited in line for nearly eight hours prior to a Trump rally. They were very comfortable and for no more than we paid, I was not worried if they disappeared while we were inside attending the event.  We located them when we exited and expect to use them many more times.  Great product for the price.
reviews.author: Snag1953

reviews.title: "Garden Treasures Blue Steel Camping Chair"
reviews.text: Love these chairs!  I bought five chairs for our firepit and two for my daughter's apartment patio.  Sturdy, holds our beverages, fold easily for compact storage and priced just right.  Highly recommend these chairs!
reviews.author: rustybear

reviews.title: "Great portable chair for the price"
reviews.text: We've been satisfied with the quality and utility of these chairs. They're lightweight and easy to carry to events or just relaxing outside with guests at our home.
reviews.author: Joeclt

reviews.title: "Nothing fancy."
reviews.text: It's a fold up camping chairâ€¦ Not sure what else you would expect from this. Not incredibly comfortable, but it holds up easily and is portable. Gets the job done
reviews.author: SR

reviews.title: "Best low dollar replacement chairs"
reviews.text: My dog ate my friends chairs that he left at our house after a deck party. We replaced the devoured chairs with these ones, and my friend said they were great!
reviews.author: rat

reviews.title: "Practical Chair"
reviews.text: This chair is serving us well as a back yard chair or for when we go places like the beach. It folds small enough to be packed away with no problems.
reviews.author: Joseph

reviews.title: "Well built"
reviews.text: As a guy pushing a tick over a deuce and a half, this chair is comfortable and supports me well. No noticeable problems and it is being used alot!
reviews.author: Clq

reviews.title: "Camping chairs"
reviews.text: We used these for a parade that we otherwise been standing for 5-6 hours. Lightweight to carry and surprisingly comfortable for the price.
reviews.author: Jo

reviews.title: "Nice Little Chair"
reviews.text: We bought these to watch our grandsons baseball games. Although still relatively new, they do seem to be pretty solid. Great price.
reviews.author: Rob

reviews.title: "unwieldy"
reviews.text: Good height and quite comfortagle.  However, as an elderly female, I find the chair a bit unwieldy with unfolding and folding
reviews.author: PETRA

reviews.title: "basic chair, great price"
reviews.text: This is your basic camp chair. Not much to say about it. folds ok  has a cover and is a great price. Fast shipping from Lowe's.
reviews.author: JZ

reviews.title: "Very Nice Chair"
reviews.text: Very nice chair at a low price.  Comfortable, sets up easily, easy to take down and very light weight.  An excellent bargain.
reviews.author: Tools

reviews.title: "Excellent bear hunting camp chair"
reviews.text: The chair is a little upright, not reclined art all, but it is comfortable,moves easily, folds up and opens easily.
reviews.author: Stuffles

reviews.title: "Our Baseball Chairs"
reviews.text: These indoor/outdoor steel camping folding chairs are perfect for watching Chandler's (the Cutest kid in the world) coach pitch baseball games. We've already been to four games since the purchase and they are very comfortable. Did I mention that my grandson Chandler is the cutest Kid n the world.
reviews.author: Clayton

reviews.title: "Camping chair"
reviews.text: Great chair & worth the price. Just what I needed for an outdoor church function.
reviews.author: Jeanne

reviews.title: "Good chair, great price"
reviews.text: Got 2 chairs and 8'x10' matching pop-up canopy for $63. Thanks Lowes
reviews.author: Hammerhead

reviews.title: "Good chair"
reviews.text: It's a good camp chair. Sturdy enough. Cup holder is a good touch.
reviews.author: JBear

reviews.title: "Chair"
reviews.text: Great for all the football games. Very comfortable. Great price.
reviews.author: Al

reviews.title: "Camping chair"
reviews.text: Camping chair is lightweight, comfortable, and economical.
reviews.author: T

reviews.title: "Black Steel Camping Chair"
reviews.text: Good Quality - used MANY  times - MANY times to come !!!
reviews.author: Jeff

reviews.text: Solid, sturdy easily packed. Ideal for keeping in car
reviews.author: Doc

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: DJ

reviews.title: "Very nice"
reviews.text: Comfortable and affordable, cup holder is little small
reviews.author: Ness

reviews.title: "beats all the similar ones price wise, go for it"
reviews.text: beats all the similar ones price wise, go for it dude
reviews.author: realbuyer

reviews.title: "Good deal for the price"
reviews.text: Perhaps not as sturdy as higher priced chairs, but does the job required.  Good value
reviews.author: Lloyd

reviews.title: "DRF Shreveport,La"
reviews.text: Good value for the money. Best fort average size individuals. Lightweight and easy to carry. Challenge to find on display in the store. Had to get 4 different store employees involved before I located someone who could actually place a hand on them.
reviews.author: Rick

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Travis

reviews.title: "Great for the beach!"
reviews.text: Best part is very light weight and easy to tote on your shoulder. Not recommended if you weigh more than 200 pounds.i Great price!
reviews.author: Lorrainess

reviews.title: "Good chair for price"
reviews.text: This chair is ok. You sit upright with it. It's not really one to lean back in and relax. It feels sturdy. My kids use it.
reviews.author: Javi

reviews.text: I bought 3 of these chairs, over all it's a decent chair, but not real comfortable to sit in for long periods of time.
reviews.author: Vicki

reviews.title: "Camping chair"
reviews.text: I paid more than I should have thinking I was getting better quality but it doesn't seem to be the case.d
reviews.author: Dottie

questions.question: "does it come with a carry case?"
questions.author: aspic64

answers.author: Cocam Product Expert
answers.text: Hello, It has a case included for the chair but is not a "carry case" as it does not have a strap.

answers.author: Gus
answers.text: Yes and it does have a carrying strap.

answers.author: Stuffles
answers.text: It does come with a case but there it's no handle our strap to carry it by.

answers.author: TK9
answers.text: Yes, but only if you have the app, fill out all the info

answers.author: 30YrsIn
answers.text: Yes, they've given me one every time I've asked.

questions.question: "what is folded size (trying to figure out storage space; we need a bunch of them)"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Cocam Product Expert
answers.text: Hello, the folded size of this chair is 19 in Long and 20.47 in Wide.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: You may contact a Lowe's representative to get help with your inquiry. You may call 1-800-445-6937 or visit their website www.lowes.com.
